title: Apple, Nvidia, Micron, Dollar Tree: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Shares of major technology firms were clawing back some of Tuesday’s losses
body:
Futures are pointing to a partial relief rally after Tuesday’s rout on Wall Street. Here’s what we’re watching before Wednesday’s trading heats up.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
